channel.title: Swimming on YOUR DAILY LIMERICK
channel.description: Recent content in Swimming on limericks.dailyonthis.site

item.description: A cosmetologist who went for a swim, Saw some fish looking quite grim. She splashed and she played, In the warm salty waves, As her troubles …
A poet went swimming in the sea, Though his movements were clumsy and free. He thought it was grand, To splash and to stand, And flounder …
A brilliant magician was he, Who decided to go for a swim. He jumped in the lake, But soon made a mistake For he couldn’t escape the big …
A mathematician went for a swim Though his stroke was quite anemic He divided and solved The pool that he volved With equations so …
A builder was swimming with zeal, Forging ahead with a wheel. The strokes were all neat, For his feat so sweet, And his speed was most real. …
A swimmer so brave and so grand Was happily swimming in the sand Their feet swishing low In the waters they go Soaking in the sun, they …
A builder with dreams of the sea, Found solace and joy when he’d swim. He’d dive and explore All around the sea floor But returned home once …
There once was a mechanic named Joe, Who liked to take a dip in the flow. It didn’t matter if it was hot, He’d jump right in, with a lot of …
A travel agent was such a fan Of swimming, she had to take a plan To the beach she would go The ocean depths she’d explore Diving for miles, …
A chemist who liked to swim and dive, Would jump into the pool and thrive. He swam around and enjoyed the ride, Though never in the pool did …
A salesperson went for a swim, in the sea he did take a dip. But he soon found out it was filled with trout, and the salesperson then had a …
An economist from the sea set out to swim, He worked hard and made himself trim. He swam with finesse, To save himself stress, Though the …
A geologist who’s quite bold and intrepid Was brave enough to take a dip In a cold lake, though his friends thought he’d make A fool of …
A blacksmith, skilled in the forge, Decided to take a swim at the gorge. A splash in the water Made him much hotter, But it helped him with …
A fashion designer with grace, Loved to do the breaststroke race. In a pool she’d swim, Making quite a whim, An athletic designer of lace.
A swimmer so swift and so spry Was seen to be gliding so high Through the waves of the sea At an amazing speed He was the fastest alive!
A funny comedian named Sue Was brave enough to swim right through The pool she did pass To make a big splash As laughter echoed around the …
A doctor so clever and nimble, Would swim with a stroke so simple. In the pool she’d dive, And feel so alive, With a form that was oh so …
There once was a chef so brave, Who went for a swim in the wave. He donned a red suit That made quite a toot, For his swimming was truly …
A musical man from the town, Decided to go for a swim around. The waves he did ride, With strokes so wide, He was known for his swimming …
A biologist out for a swim Tried to observe every fin That fluttered by In the crystalline sky Til the sun began to dim.
An artist who wanted to swim Took to the sea with a grin She jumped in the waves No water she’d save And happily went for a swim!
A fashion designer, swimming in the sea, Had an outfit that made the waves feel glee. It was a sight to see With its bright neon hues And it …
An editor found swimming so grand, He’d never learned it, but he’d planned To dive in the pool And learn the basic rules He was determined, …
A geologist went out for a swim, On a hot summer’s day, quite trim. He dove and he splashed, Though the rocks he had bashed, As he looked …
A teacher who went for a swim, Their toes never quite touched the rim. They splashed and they played, And made many a wave, Their lessons …
A tour guide named Evan, while swimming, had a yen To show off his skills and his daring He would jump in the sea And impress all with glee …
A banker by trade who did swim, In the pool his skills were quite slim. He’d float and he’d sink, Though with effort he’d think That he …
A talented producer was swimming, His laps were quite inspiring; He’d take a deep dive And then come alive With ideas he found while …
A dancer was swimming, it seemed rather odd, Though it was not a dance, it still felt like a trod. He cut through the waves, Not missing a …
A curious researcher did swim, Through an ocean of knowledge so dim. He explored and he searched, All that he learned, To uncover a truth he …
There once was a guitarist so brave, Who liked to swim in a wave. It was quite a sight, A rocker who could fight, The wildest of waters to …
A cowboy went for a swim one day, Despite his horse’s dismay. The beast had a fit, But the cowboy would not quit His swim in the waters so …
A carpenter who was rather keen Took a dip in the pond ever serene He paddled around Without a sound His tools left to rust on the green.
